name: Break Chance Memento
description: Break Chance Memento is a story about family bonds across time and involves time travel, tracking down a serial killer, and potential gay romance. Can Shuuki save the people he cares about by traveling through time? Whether or not he makes it through to a happy ending is completely up to the player's decisions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.66 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space
